resources.string: After a nuclear apocalypse caused by man during Of a third World War, the 318 survivors Space stations and manage to live and reproduce, reaching The number of 4000. But 97 years later, the mother ship, the Ark, is in a pitiful state. About one hundred juvenile delinquents imprisoned over the years for crimes or Betrayals are chosen as guinea pigs by the authorities To go down to Earth and test the chances of survival. As soon as they arrive, they Discover a dangerous yet fascinating new world.
